acceptedAnswer.text: Disputifier automates chargeback management for Shopify merchants by generating tailored responses to disputes, increasing the chances of winning chargebacks.
It provides fraud detection tools, alerts, and refund automation to help prevent disputes before they occur.

mainEntity.name: Does Disputifier integrate with major payment processors?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, it works with platforms like PayPal and Stripe.
Pricing is based on a percentage of the value from won chargebacks, ranging from 12-20%.
